title: Differences in cytochrome c, 5 answer options 2

content.description:
A scientist used the amino acid sequence of cytochrome c in different species to consider evolutionary relationships.

The data below summarize the number of differences in the amino acid sequences of cytochrome c found in selected species.
content.question: Which of the following phylogenetic trees can be supported by the data?

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
